price: 126. (Allah) akoyebisa ye: Lolenge wana nde eyelaki yo bilembo bia biso mpona kotangisa yo, kasi obosanaki yango, yango wana lelo tobosani yo.(2)
arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَاۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُنسَىٰ
footnotes: 2  Lelo tobosani yo: Elakisi: Lelo totiki yo nakati ya moto, mpo ete Allah abosanaka te.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla kadhālika atatka āyātunā fanasītahā wakadhālika al-yawma tunsā
